thread.title: BRIEF-Baker Hughes, A GE Co Announces Jan 2018 Rig Counts

title: BRIEF-Baker Hughes, A GE Co Announces Jan 2018 Rig Counts
text:
09 AM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Baker Hughes, A GE Co Announces Jan 2018 Rig Counts Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Baker Hughes A Ge Co: 
* BAKER HUGHES, A GE COMPANY ANNOUNCES JANUARY 2018 RIG COUNTS 
* BAKER HUGHES A GE CO - WORLDWIDE RIG COUNT FOR JANUARY 2018 WAS 2,175, UP 86 FROM 2,089 COUNTED IN DECEMBER 2017 
* BAKER HUGHES A GE CO - AVERAGE US RIG COUNT FOR JANUARY 2018 WAS 937, UP 7 FROM 930 COUNTED IN DECEMBER 2017, 
* BAKER HUGHES A GE CO - INTERNATIONAL OFFSHORE RIG COUNT FOR JANUARY 2018 WAS 196, UP 5 FROM 191 COUNTED IN DECEMBER 2017 
* BAKER HUGHES A GE CO - AVERAGE CANADIAN RIG COUNT FOR JANUARY 2018 WAS 278, UP 73 FROM 205 COUNTED IN DECEMBER 2017 
* BAKER HUGHES A GE CO - INTERNATIONAL RIG COUNT FOR JANUARY 2018 WAS 960, UP 6 FROM 954 COUNTED IN DECEMBER 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
